name: Cactus Arcade 2.0
description:
Cactus Arcade 2.0 is a compilation of games by Jonathan Söderström, bundled into one package and run through an interactive interface.

The following games are included: * Ad Nauseam 2BlockOn! EVACGamma IV KrebswelteKryzta NorrlandPing Pong! PrecisionProtoganda II RETRO 4Silent ChainSpace Fuck! Stallions in America Stench MechanicsThis Is Infinity The Ultra Mission* Xoldiers

The game Silent Chain wasn't released outside this compilation, apart from an early unfinished version.
